LABEL: 0x31F
STRING: The only thing writhing inside the weakly lit room was sin.

LABEL: 0x34B
STRING: At the bottom of a cage where sin and punishment melded together.

LABEL: 0x371
STRING: If you could stay where you drifted to without thinking,

LABEL: 0x3B9
STRING: if you could keep crying endlessly, would that be a form of happiness?

LABEL: 0x40B
STRING: One could probably continue living for hundreds of years without change at the bottom of the sea.

LABEL: 0x451
STRING: However, the apex of creation had to live on.

LABEL: 0x485
STRING: There was no escaping the emptiness of time.

LABEL: 0x4C1
STRING: We had to keep moving forward while being subjected to constant change.

LABEL: 0x56A
STRING: 「...Hiragino-san.」

LABEL: 0x5B6
STRING: 「Did you...」

LABEL: 0x5D2
STRING: 「...Did you see Tokiwa?」

LABEL: 0x620
STRING: Hiragino's shoulders trembled.

LABEL: 0x64A
STRING: The man who was attacked by <COOS> had survived.

LABEL: 0x68A
STRING: Whether or not it could be called being "alive" was another matter,

LABEL: 0x6D0
STRING: but at the very least, he wasn't biologically dead.

LABEL: 0x769
STRING: So... what about Saihouji Tokiwa?

LABEL: 0x791
STRING: What we had witnessed was <COOS> enveloping her entire body.

LABEL: 0x7DD
STRING: None of us knew what had happened to her after that.

LABEL: 0x825
STRING: Even though I had screamed in self-delusion that she wasn't dead, that I would save her,

LABEL: 0x871
STRING: it now seemed like she wasn't dead after all.

LABEL: 0x906
STRING: If she was alive, if there was another chance for me to take her hand...

LABEL: 0x954
STRING: This time, I would save her――

LABEL: 0x9EA
STRING: 「――I didn't see her.」

LABEL: 0xA38
STRING: 「I didn't see her... I couldn't find her.」

LABEL: 0xA87
STRING: Hiragino answered in a hollow voice without looking at me.

LABEL: 0xB25
STRING: ――What was he talking about?

LABEL: 0xB6D
STRING: 「What do you mean, you couldn't find her?」

LABEL: 0xBB7
STRING: 「Just tell me the truth!」

LABEL: 0xBED
STRING: 「Is she alive, or is she dead...?」

LABEL: 0xC27
STRING: 「Or, maybe you're the one who killed her――」

LABEL: 0xCD0
STRING: 「That's not it!!」

LABEL: 0xCF4
STRING: He shouted.

LABEL: 0xD08
STRING: His self-punishing voice pierced my eardrums and chest.

LABEL: 0xDF6
STRING: 「I really... didn't see Tokiwa-kun.」

LABEL: 0xE30
STRING: 「There was no one at the scene you told me about.」

LABEL: 0xE6C
STRING: 「That man was lying in a nearby room.」

LABEL: 0xEA2
STRING: 「...After that, I didn't have time to look for her... No.」

LABEL: 0xF06
STRING: 「I decided to run away from her after killing the man.」

LABEL: 0xF67
STRING: A collapsed man.

LABEL: 0xF83
STRING: A dying man that someone had to save.

LABEL: 0xFBD
STRING: If he could only focus on saving him, he could forget about Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x1003
STRING: He could turn away from the tragedy that had struck her.

LABEL: 0x103B
STRING: Hiragino's confession of guilt was probably not a lie.

LABEL: 0x1079
STRING: But no one could blame him for that.

LABEL: 0x110E
STRING: Not me, at least.

LABEL: 0x1134
STRING: As the person who sank the <SHEEP III>, I had already killed dozens of people.

LABEL: 0x1185
STRING: That sin was not something I could atone for... I knew that.

LABEL: 0x122E
STRING: I knew that, but I'd done everything I could to make up for it,

LABEL: 0x1266
STRING: so that all the survivors could escape to the surface.

LABEL: 0x12B0
STRING: I was a murderer. And because I was, I had to play the detective.

LABEL: 0x12FA
STRING: I haven't forgotten whose words those were, have I?

LABEL: 0x140E
STRING: 「It's something only you can do.」

LABEL: 0x143C
STRING: 「Will you find out what is happening on this ship?」

LABEL: 0x1483
STRING: So, why was he so troubled,

LABEL: 0x153E
STRING: when it was he who told me there was still something I could do, even though I was burdened by sin?

LABEL: 0x163D
STRING: 「Sorry.」

LABEL: 0x1657
STRING: 「I didn't mean to accuse you...」

LABEL: 0x16A2
STRING: 「I know.」

LABEL: 0x16BE
STRING: 「Either way, I didn't see Tokiwa-kun at all.」

LABEL: 0x16F8
STRING: 「I couldn't confirm her death... She might have gone somewhere on her own.」

LABEL: 0x1745
STRING: 「So, she could still be alive...?」

LABEL: 0x1775
STRING: Even so, what did it matter if she was?

LABEL: 0x17AF
STRING: There was no guarantee that I'd have the opportunity to grasp her hand again.

LABEL: 0x1807
STRING: That man's life and death――

LABEL: 0x1827
STRING: Tokiwa might be alive.

LABEL: 0x1859
STRING: However, there was no doubt that her life was now infinitely close to death.

LABEL: 0x1899
STRING: If she was still alive, what in the world should I do?

LABEL: 0x18DF
STRING: What would I do if I came face to face with her alive?

LABEL: 0x1927
STRING: I wasn't confident that I could come up with an answer, even if I thought about it now.

LABEL: 0x196F
STRING: I wanted to save her...

LABEL: 0x1995
STRING: Even when I knew in advance that there was nothing I could do to save her,

LABEL: 0x19DD
STRING: if I saw Tokiwa alive in front of me, I...

LABEL: 0x1A78
STRING: ...Would I be able to kill her?

LABEL: 0x1ACC
STRING: Just as I hid Reiri's death――

LABEL: 0x1AFA
STRING: Tokiwa's life and death were concealed.

LABEL: 0x1B20
STRING: Whether she was alive or dead, particles or waves, couldn't be determined until she was observed.

LABEL: 0x1B7A
STRING: It was a possibility, a hope...

LABEL: 0x1C07
STRING: ...A fetter and a yoke.

LABEL: 0x1C29
STRING: If anything, as long as everything was settled before I saw her with my own eyes, I had nothing to worry about.

LABEL: 0x1C7F
STRING: I hated how weak I was, wishing for something like that in the corner of my heart.

LABEL: 0x1CC5
STRING: What would Yukari do at a time like this?

LABEL: 0x1CFD
STRING: Still sleeping in the emergency room, she had made decisions―at times cruel―according to her responsibilities,

LABEL: 0x1D3D
STRING: with no concern if they made her a villain.

LABEL: 0x1D83
STRING: If it was her, what would she do――?

LABEL: 0x1E79
STRING: 「I hate to say this, but...」

LABEL: 0x1EA3
STRING: 「Even if you see Tokiwa-san's body, make sure you don't touch her.」

LABEL: 0x2024
STRING: 「...I have one condition.」

LABEL: 0x2052
STRING: 「If we're splitting into two groups,

LABEL: 0x209A
STRING: let me go to the rear section.」

LABEL: 0x2149
STRING: ――Wait a minute.

LABEL: 0x2163
STRING: Yukari strictly forbade making contact with Tokiwa and headed for the rear section during the operation.

LABEL: 0x21AF
STRING: She said she couldn't put others in danger.

LABEL: 0x21F7
STRING: But, was that really all there was to it?

LABEL: 0x2223
STRING: She had gone to the rear section alone, without any regard for her own safety.

LABEL: 0x2267
STRING: What the hell was she doing there――?

LABEL: 0x22FA
STRING: 「Don't tell me――」

LABEL: 0x2316
STRING: A possibility reared its head in my mind.

LABEL: 0x233C
STRING: I tried to stand up and staggered over to Hiragino.

LABEL: 0x23E6
STRING: 「What is it, Katagiri-kun?!」

LABEL: 0x2415
STRING: 「We need to get to the rear section.」

LABEL: 0x24A7
STRING: 「Calm down!」

LABEL: 0x24C8
STRING: 「There's no time for that.」

LABEL: 0x2558
STRING: 「What the hell is going on with you――」

LABEL: 0x258B
STRING: 「I'll explain later.」

LABEL: 0x25A7
STRING: 「Just please, let's hurry to the rear section.」

LABEL: 0x25F1
STRING: I got up and started running.

LABEL: 0x269D
STRING: ――Instantly, my legs got tangled up, and I fell to the floor again.

LABEL: 0x26D7
STRING: Damn it!

LABEL: 0x26ED
STRING: Was I a clown or something?

LABEL: 0x2717
STRING: My heart and emotions were pushing me forward.

LABEL: 0x2745
STRING: Unable to keep up with them, my body crawled on its own...

LABEL: 0x2795
STRING: Then, Hiragino put my arm around his shoulder.

LABEL: 0x2833
STRING: 「We're in a hurry, right?」

LABEL: 0x2858
STRING: I hated myself for being unable to do anything and always needing help.

LABEL: 0x28A6
STRING: But, there was no time for self-derision or thanking him.

LABEL: 0x294E
STRING: With the two of us forming a three-legged tripod, we hurried towards the rear section, shoulder to shoulder.

LABEL: 0x29AE
STRING: My breathing was heavy.

LABEL: 0x29C6
STRING: I had a very bad feeling about this.

LABEL: 0x29EC
STRING: Tokiwa had disappeared.

LABEL: 0x2A0C
STRING: I couldn't discern Yukari's intentions.

LABEL: 0x2A2C
STRING: Everything had happened in the rear section.

LABEL: 0x2A58
STRING: And the one in there right now was――

LABEL: 0x2B4F
STRING: 「Kyaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!!」

LABEL: 0x2B82
STRING: A shrill scream echoed as if ripping through a curtain.

LABEL: 0x2C3A
STRING: 「Touri-kun...!」

LABEL: 0x2C5D
STRING: Hiragino tossed me to the floor and started running in the direction of the scream.

LABEL: 0x2CBC
STRING: 「Hiragino-san, the warehouse!」

LABEL: 0x2CE0
STRING: I called out to his back.

LABEL: 0x2D00
STRING: ...I wasn't certain.

LABEL: 0x2D1E
STRING: But, Touri had gone to where Reiri was supposed to be.

LABEL: 0x2D5E
STRING: There was only one place in the rear section that had a connection to her...

LABEL: 0x2D96
STRING: I walked alone down the hallway where Hiragino's back had disappeared to.

LABEL: 0x2DD0
STRING: Returning to the place where it all began...

LABEL: 0x309C
STRING: I dragged myself to the warehouse while leaning against the wall most of the way.

LABEL: 0x310A
STRING: Hiragino stood frozen at the entrance.

LABEL: 0x3132
STRING: Pushing him out of his daze, I peered inside the warehouse.

LABEL: 0x316A
STRING: ...I'd been right after all.

LABEL: 0x3244
STRING: There were piles of cardboard boxes on the floor.

LABEL: 0x326A
STRING: Touri seemed to have rummaged through them. It was even more chaotic than before.

LABEL: 0x32AE
STRING: She was standing before the disorderly objects.

LABEL: 0x32DC
STRING: She screamed, then put her hand to her mouth and stared at a single point.

LABEL: 0x332A
STRING: Where she looked was the center of the chaos, as if it were the ruler of this small space.

LABEL: 0x3380
STRING: She was looking at a small box.

LABEL: 0x3398
STRING: At one of the plain cardboard boxes.

LABEL: 0x33C8
STRING: It was tucked away in the back of the room like someone had hidden it away, and from it...

LABEL: 0x341A
STRING: ...A hand was sticking out.

LABEL: 0x343E
STRING: Something lay inside that open box, hugging its knees.

LABEL: 0x3476
STRING: A colorful mass of clothes.

LABEL: 0x3496
STRING: I knew what that was.

LABEL: 0x34C0
STRING: I knew the name of the girl stuffed inside that cardboard box――

LABEL: 0x3568
STRING: 「Tokiwa――」

LABEL: 0x35A4
STRING: I couldn't help but say it out loud.

LABEL: 0x35C8
STRING: I had been searching for her for a long time.

LABEL: 0x35EA
STRING: I had hoped that she was still alive.

LABEL: 0x361C
STRING: And all this time, she was dead――

LABEL: 0x3646
STRING: She was burying her face in her knees, sleeping peacefully as if encased in a cocoon.

LABEL: 0x36A0
STRING: Sleeping...?

LABEL: 0x376D
STRING: 「Why...? Tokiwa-chan...」

LABEL: 0x379B
STRING: 「Why... isn't Reiri here...?」

LABEL: 0x382B
STRING: Touri walked up to her slowly while mumbling to herself.

LABEL: 0x386D
STRING: She eventually reached out and tried to touch her――

LABEL: 0x3947
STRING: 「Stop it!!」

LABEL: 0x3968
STRING: Hiragino appeared out of nowhere and grabbed her outstretched arm.

LABEL: 0x39BD
STRING: 「What are you doing?!」

LABEL: 0x3AC5
STRING: Ignoring her protests, Hiragino swapped places with Touri and faced Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x3B51
STRING: She lay there like a Western doll dressed in traditional Japanese clothing.

LABEL: 0x3B95
STRING: Hiragino peered at her and illuminated her face with a pen-shaped flashlight he was holding.

LABEL: 0x3BE7
STRING: Light hit her still-open pupils.

LABEL: 0x3C1D
STRING: Her vivid jade eyes.

LABEL: 0x3C6B
STRING: Finally, Hiragino quietly shook his head.

LABEL: 0x3C97
STRING: The meaning of that gesture... was clear.

LABEL: 0x3D2B
STRING: 「W-What...?」

LABEL: 0x3D4E
STRING: Touri was shocked.

LABEL: 0x3D6C
STRING: This was the ending that I had predicted long ago.

LABEL: 0x3D9A
STRING: The anxiety that I'd anticipated just became reality.

LABEL: 0x3DD0
STRING: It was a poor, fitting ending to this tragedy.

LABEL: 0x3E1C
STRING: But, I couldn't accept it.

LABEL: 0x3E44
STRING: It wasn't just Touri. I felt the same way too.

LABEL: 0x3EA0
STRING: Somewhere deep inside, I had believed.

LABEL: 0x3F2E
STRING: I was waiting... for a happy miracle.

LABEL: 0x4032
STRING: 「My name is Saihouji Tokiwa, a genius physicist and an eternal beauty.」

LABEL: 0x407E
STRING: 「I'd prefer if you called me Tokki, but anything is fine!」

LABEL: 0x40CF
STRING: No matter what Reiri had said,

LABEL: 0x40F7
STRING: no matter what I had seen at that moment when she was swallowed by the light,

LABEL: 0x412D
STRING: no matter what I was told about the end of the man infected with <COOS>...

LABEL: 0x41DE
STRING: ...I never thought of Tokiwa as being dead.

LABEL: 0x4212
STRING: There was no way she could have lived.

LABEL: 0x423E
STRING: That was perfectly obvious.

LABEL: 0x4272
STRING: But still, if it was her, I thought just maybe...

LABEL: 0x42B8
STRING: I knew it, but... I couldn't give up.

LABEL: 0x440B
STRING: 「Why did... something so cruel happen...?」

LABEL: 0x443B
STRING: 「This is no way for someone to die...」

LABEL: 0x446D
STRING: 「Who did this...?」

LABEL: 0x44B3
STRING: 「Why did Tokiwa-chan have to go through all this?!」

LABEL: 0x4500
STRING: A boxed-up corpse.

LABEL: 0x4522
STRING: It was like a coffin,

LABEL: 0x4568
STRING: but there weren't any signs of respect in the way she had been put there.

LABEL: 0x45BC
STRING: She had been roughly shoved into the cramped box.

LABEL: 0x45F0
STRING: Like she was something that shouldn't be found.

LABEL: 0x462E
STRING: It was a cruel way to die, as Touri said.

LABEL: 0x467A
STRING: However――

LABEL: 0x46AC
STRING: What had Yukari thought as she carried Tokiwa?

LABEL: 0x46E6
STRING: For what and for whose sake had she done this?

LABEL: 0x4778
STRING: ――Was it to make sure we didn't make a wrong choice?

LABEL: 0x47AC
STRING: ――So that we wouldn't think of keeping Tokiwa alive when she had no choice but to die?

LABEL: 0x47F2
STRING: I had no right to blame her for what she did.

LABEL: 0x482A
STRING: I couldn't say anything―not to Yukari nor Touri.

LABEL: 0x4904
STRING: Touri's shoulders trembled as she stared at Tokiwa's corpse.

LABEL: 0x4946
STRING: The shock of her death wasn't the only thing causing her suffering.

LABEL: 0x4984
STRING: Who Touri was searching for in this warehouse wasn't Tokiwa, but――

LABEL: 0x49CF
STRING: 「...Save Reiri.」

LABEL: 0x4A4E
STRING: 「Katagiri-san, Hiragino-san... You have to save Reiri!」

LABEL: 0x4A91
STRING: Touri's face was pale.

LABEL: 0x4AB3
STRING: She was no longer looking at Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x4BB4
STRING: 「Touri-kun, calm down――」

LABEL: 0x4BED
STRING: 「Reiri... If she's like this too...」

LABEL: 0x4C1F
STRING: 「I don't even know where she went...」

LABEL: 0x4C63
STRING: 「Since I have Reiri... Tokiwa-chan... Reiri... But...」

LABEL: 0x4CA3
STRING: 「Why, how..?! Where's Reiri?!」

LABEL: 0x4CDA
STRING: She wasn't making much sense.

LABEL: 0x4D0E
STRING: The only thing I could tell was how desperate she was.

LABEL: 0x4D7F
STRING: 「Tell me, where's Reiri...?」

LABEL: 0x4DAE
STRING: The girl's voice drifted aimlessly through the air.

LABEL: 0x4DDC
STRING: Touri had lost her certainty that Reiri was in here by herself.

LABEL: 0x4E2E
STRING: She was her twin sister, her only relative.

LABEL: 0x4E52
STRING: Touri had always prioritized Reiri over anyone else.

LABEL: 0x4E8A
STRING: This girl was extremely, excessively, and abnormally afraid of losing her sister――

LABEL: 0x4F3C
STRING: 「That's right... POL!」

LABEL: 0x4F8D
STRING: 【What is it, Nomura Touri?】

LABEL: 0x4FAD
STRING: Touri called out to her wristband.

LABEL: 0x4FD9
STRING: POL's artificial voice was blissfully calm, despite Touri's desperate voice filled with impatience and confusion.

LABEL: 0x503B
STRING: 「Reiri! Where's my sister?!」

LABEL: 0x5072
STRING: 【I don't know.】

LABEL: 0x509F
STRING: 「Why?!」

LABEL: 0x50C0
STRING: 【My apologies.】

LABEL: 0x50F3
STRING: 「...Useless――!」

LABEL: 0x511C
STRING: She spat out the words in frustration.

LABEL: 0x5136
STRING: There was no way that POL, who was isolated from the <SHEEP III>, would know about Reiri's whereabouts.

LABEL: 0x518E
STRING: Touri gave up on POL and focused on Hiragino next.

LABEL: 0x5298
STRING: 「You know, don't you, Hiragino-san?」

LABEL: 0x52C6
STRING: 「About where Reiri is.」

LABEL: 0x5355
STRING: 「Aren't you a doctor!?」

LABEL: 0x538F
STRING: 「Touri-kun...!」

LABEL: 0x53B2
STRING: Hiragino gave her a pitying look.

LABEL: 0x53DC
STRING: However――

LABEL: 0x543B
STRING: 「Where is she...?」

LABEL: 0x545E
STRING: Touri asked the empty space.

LABEL: 0x54A4
STRING: ...Should I keep her death a secret from her, even now?

LABEL: 0x54EE
STRING: Possibilities and hope were what kept people alive.

LABEL: 0x5520
STRING: We had survived this far inside this dark,

LABEL: 0x5558
STRING: sunken submarine because there was a chance of survival.

LABEL: 0x55A6
STRING: However, who was it that had hurt Touri like this?

LABEL: 0x55E0
STRING: If I lied and gave her a faint hope that Reiri was alive and then ended up revealing the truth...

LABEL: 0x5620
STRING: That was just betrayal.

LABEL: 0x566E
STRING: What I did was a betrayal and a lie.

LABEL: 0x56A4
STRING: No matter how I tried to explain it, all I had done was hurt Touri.

LABEL: 0x5757
STRING: In which case――

LABEL: 0x5773
STRING: Shouldn't I be the one to settle this?

LABEL: 0x57B1
STRING: 「Touri...」

LABEL: 0x5828
STRING: ――Everyone was dying.

LABEL: 0x584E
STRING: Deaths kept piling up at the bottom of the sea.

LABEL: 0x587C
STRING: Lumiere=Hikari.

LABEL: 0x589E
STRING: Saihouji Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x5917
STRING: And... Nomura Reiri.

LABEL: 0x5939
STRING: What was the point of hiding her death alone at this point?

LABEL: 0x5989
STRING: A hidden death... My sister's death.

LABEL: 0x59B3
STRING: And what did that bring me?

LABEL: 0x59DD
STRING: All I could do now was――

LABEL: 0x5AA1
STRING: 「Touri.」

LABEL: 0x5AB7
STRING: 「Reiri is inside the rescue ship.」

LABEL: 0x5B4B
STRING: 「Really?!」

LABEL: 0x5B74
STRING: 「Katagiri-kun! If you knew, why didn't you――」

LABEL: 0x5BB3
STRING: Hiragino was about to say something but stopped mid-sentence.

LABEL: 0x5BD9
STRING: ...He must have realized.

LABEL: 0x5BFD
STRING: Yes. Reiri was definitely inside the rescue ship.

LABEL: 0x5C2B
STRING: But, there was a reason I couldn't tell them that.

LABEL: 0x5C61
STRING: There was only one reason for it.

LABEL: 0x5C89
STRING: Because Reiri, too, had already――

LABEL: 0x5D1D
STRING: 「No way...」

LABEL: 0x5D39
STRING: 「――Y-You're lying!!」

LABEL: 0x5D62
STRING: Touri screamed.

LABEL: 0x5D7A
STRING: However, contrary to the strength of her voice, her body was shaking.

LABEL: 0x5DB6
STRING: ...I understand. You just can't accept it.

LABEL: 0x5E0C
STRING: Isn't that right, Touri?

LABEL: 0x5E30
STRING: I walked up to her and her pale face.

LABEL: 0x5E5A
STRING: I took another step so that Touri, who tried to retreat, wouldn't be able to escape.

LABEL: 0x5F08
STRING: 「Don't... come near me...」

LABEL: 0x5F31
STRING: 「I'm sorry for not telling you. But, I'm not lying.」

LABEL: 0x5F6F
STRING: 「Let's go see her together.」

LABEL: 0x5F99
STRING: I reached out to the timid Touri.

LABEL: 0x5FC1
STRING: She slowly reached for my hand――

LABEL: 0x600D
STRING: And slapped it away.

LABEL: 0x602B
STRING: 「Touri...」

LABEL: 0x6054
STRING: 「――Stop joking around.」

LABEL: 0x607B
STRING: In a complete turnaround, her voice was now calm.

LABEL: 0x609B
STRING: Her quiet, cold voice bore no resemblance to before.

LABEL: 0x6161
STRING: 「If Reiri's dead... and someone like me is alive... Reiri...」

LABEL: 0x61C5
STRING: 「...She's alive... She has to be.」

LABEL: 0x61FA
STRING: 「Touri!!」

LABEL: 0x624E
STRING: My voice didn't reach her.

LABEL: 0x6272
STRING: Touri ran out of the warehouse.

LABEL: 0x629C
STRING: I chased after her as she ran with all her might.

LABEL: 0x638C
STRING: My feet got tangled instantly.

LABEL: 0x63AE
STRING: I was hit by deja vu.

LABEL: 0x642B
STRING: I just looked at Touri's back as it got further away from me, unable to catch up to her.

LABEL: 0x6485
STRING: Unable to say anything or do anything for her, all I could do was stand in place.

LABEL: 0x64CB
STRING: 「Touri...!」

LABEL: 0x64E7
STRING: I looked at her running back.

LABEL: 0x6505
STRING: The back that was filled with hope just a moment ago.

LABEL: 0x6535
STRING: But now it was different.

LABEL: 0x6555
STRING: She glared at me just before she dashed off, and I could see it in her eyes...

LABEL: 0x6597
STRING: ――Madness.

LABEL: 0x6625
STRING: 「Katagiri-kun!」

LABEL: 0x6644
STRING: Hiragino reached out to me as I lost my balance.

LABEL: 0x6690
STRING: 「T-Thanks

LABEL: 0x6734
STRING: He grabbed me by the collar and pressed me against the wall.

LABEL: 0x676E
STRING: Looking up, I saw his eyes burning with anger at point-blank range.

LABEL: 0x681E
STRING: 「What the hell do you think you're doing?!」

LABEL: 0x684A
STRING: 「What's the point of cornering her like that?!」

LABEL: 0x687D
STRING: 「Corner her...?」

LABEL: 0x689F
STRING: 「...I just couldn't hide it any longer and play games with her.」

LABEL: 0x6953
STRING: 「What?!」

LABEL: 0x6970
STRING: The grip on my neck tightened.

LABEL: 0x698A
STRING: Hiragino put even more weight on the arm he was pressing against me.

LABEL: 0x69C2
STRING: But that didn't mean I would stay silent.

LABEL: 0x69F8
STRING: 「The more hope and possibilities you hold on to, the greater the pain when you lose them.」

LABEL: 0x6A42
STRING: 「You can't just dangle a carrot in front of Touri and say that it's for her sake!」

LABEL: 0x6AFE
STRING: 「――Still!」

LABEL: 0x6B1E
STRING: 「No matter how hopeless things seem, you should try to survive!」

LABEL: 0x6C00
STRING: I shook off Hiragino's arm.

LABEL: 0x6C22
STRING: Ngh... Did this guy know how to control his strength?

LABEL: 0x6C60
STRING: I fixed my collar and tried to catch my breath.

LABEL: 0x6C8A
STRING: On the other hand, Hiragino took out a xylitol tablet and swallowed it in one gulp.

LABEL: 0x6D44
STRING: 「Shit... Don't you know what placebo effect is?」

LABEL: 0x6D76
STRING: 「Anything is fine... Hope leads to survival.」

LABEL: 0x6DD8
STRING: 「At least until we get out of here... If there's even a shred of hope, then...」

LABEL: 0x6E29
STRING: That was what I was thinking, too.

LABEL: 0x6E4F
STRING: We needed hope in the depths of this sea.

LABEL: 0x6E79
STRING: In order for us to survive, there had to exist a possibility that we would eventually be saved.

LABEL: 0x6EC7
STRING: If we thought we couldn't be saved, we wouldn't be able to survive for long.

LABEL: 0x6F33
STRING: But, I couldn't stand it.

LABEL: 0x6F5F
STRING: I couldn't bear toying with Touri's feelings any longer――

LABEL: 0x6FB2
STRING: 「Why did I――」

LABEL: 0x6FDD
STRING: 「...What?」

LABEL: 0x6FFD
STRING: Hiragino stammered after blurting out something.

LABEL: 0x702D
STRING: What was he going to say?

LABEL: 0x704F
STRING: What had Hiragino done for the sake of the placebo effect,

LABEL: 0x7085
STRING: for hope to survive?

LABEL: 0x710A
STRING: 「...What are you hiding?」

LABEL: 0x715C
STRING: 「What is there to hide at this stage?」

LABEL: 0x7190
STRING: 「Please, tell me.」

LABEL: 0x71BC
STRING: Our heads creaked.

LABEL: 0x71D2
STRING: Our breathing was ragged.

LABEL: 0x71EA
STRING: We were both at our limits.

LABEL: 0x7210
STRING: At our limits...

LABEL: 0x723F
STRING: 「You and Touri-kun... You two should leave the <SHEEP III> by yourselves.」

LABEL: 0x7284
STRING: 「Just us two?」

LABEL: 0x729B
STRING: What about him and Yukari...?

LABEL: 0x72BD
STRING: Hiragino sighed in resignation.

LABEL: 0x735B
STRING: 「――You see, Momoi...」

LABEL: 0x7379
STRING: 「It's too late for her.」

LABEL: 0x73A1
STRING: 「There is no cure.」

LABEL: 0x73CE
STRING: 「Wha――」

LABEL: 0x7406
STRING: Yukari had fallen asleep, infected with <Alice>.

LABEL: 0x7430
STRING: If we had the cure, we might be able to save her.

LABEL: 0x74D8
STRING: 「There never was a cure on this ship.」

LABEL: 0x750E
STRING: 「She was mistaken.」

LABEL: 0x7535
STRING: Was... that even possible?

LABEL: 0x7569
STRING: If that was true, what had we been doing all this time?

LABEL: 0x75A9
STRING: It was all futile... Just a costly act to give birth to hope.

LABEL: 0x75E9
STRING: Was there any point to our struggles...?

LABEL: 0x7629
STRING: 「――If we return to the surface...」

LABEL: 0x764B
STRING: 「As long as we get her back to the surface, we can administer the cure then.」

LABEL: 0x768F
STRING: 「That way, Yukari-san will be――」

LABEL: 0x76CA
STRING: 「There's no cure on the surface, either.」

LABEL: 0x76F0
STRING: 「It never existed in the first place.」

LABEL: 0x773D
STRING: What――?

LABEL: 0x7755
STRING: My hopes were crushed.

LABEL: 0x7773
STRING: No, that was wrong.

LABEL: 0x778D
STRING: That star of hope didn't exist to begin with.

LABEL: 0x77BD
STRING: It was more like I had chased the light of a star that had vanished from existence long ago.

LABEL: 0x77FF
STRING: That fake compass... disappeared.

LABEL: 0x782F
STRING: 「But how?! Yukari believed that the cure was here――」

LABEL: 0x788A
STRING: 「She was mistaken, as I said.」

LABEL: 0x78C4
STRING: 「I'm repeating myself, but there's no cure on this ship. There's no cure for <Alice> anywhere.」

LABEL: 0x7928
STRING: 「It doesn't exist in this world.」

LABEL: 0x7957
STRING: 「...So, once you get infected, that's it?」

LABEL: 0x79B0
STRING: 「Of course, since <Alice> is a retrovirus, reverse transcriptase inhibitors are effective.」

LABEL: 0x7A0C
STRING: 「But that will only delay the onset of the symptoms.」

LABEL: 0x7A9F
STRING: 「It's just like with AIDS... After the onset, it's too late.」

LABEL: 0x7ADA
STRING: Then, Yukari was already――

LABEL: 0x7B00
STRING: She had fallen asleep, unaware of the truth...

LABEL: 0x7B45
STRING: 「There's one more thing.」

LABEL: 0x7BC2
STRING: 「――You're mistaken too...」

LABEL: 0x7BF5
STRING: 「Mistaken?」

LABEL: 0x7C0F
STRING: Hiragino hesitated, looking like he was at his wit's end――

LABEL: 0x7C3F
STRING: ――And, revealed the truth.

LABEL: 0x7CE7
STRING: 「――It's not just <Alice>.」

LABEL: 0x7D13
STRING: 「She's infected with <COOS> as well.」

LABEL: 0x7D64
STRING: 「That's a lie...」

LABEL: 0x7D7E
STRING: 「That can't be true!　It has to be a lie!」

LABEL: 0x7DCF
STRING: 「And what if it is?!」

LABEL: 0x7DF4
STRING: Hiragino shouted.

LABEL: 0x7E0C
STRING: Anger and lamentation. Feelings he couldn't process were all layered on top of one another.

LABEL: 0x7E5E
STRING: His face contorted in pain.

LABEL: 0x7F33
STRING: 「How I wish it were a lie...」

LABEL: 0x7F68
STRING: Hiragino's voice, which he squeezed out, suddenly became weaker...

LABEL: 0x7F9E
STRING: He looked like he was about to burst into tears, as if he was trying to hold something back――

LABEL: 0x7FE7
STRING: 「I saw it...」

LABEL: 0x800D
STRING: 「I saw... that light in her arm.」

LABEL: 0x804A
STRING: Right, back when we'd rescued Yukari after she'd collapsed...

LABEL: 0x807E
STRING: Hiragino had rolled up her sleeves and opened his eyes wide as if he'd noticed something.

LABEL: 0x8127
STRING: 「But, when the hell did she come into contact with <COOS>?」

LABEL: 0x817E
STRING: 「It was probably when... she killed Tokiwa-kun.」

LABEL: 0x81BD
STRING: Before the extermination of <COOS>――

LABEL: 0x81E3
STRING: Yukari had headed to the rear section and dealt with Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x8217
STRING: It made sense that she was infected during that time.

LABEL: 0x8251
STRING: But, if she was infected with both <Alice> and <COOS>, then...

LABEL: 0x82B2
STRING: 「In any case, Momoi can't return to the surface.」

LABEL: 0x82EA
STRING: 「No, she probably wouldn't try to leave... On the contrary.」

LABEL: 0x8326
STRING: 「If she happens to wake up and realizes she's infected with <COOS>...」

LABEL: 0x8376
STRING: 「I have no doubt that she'll kill herself. That's the kind of person she is.」

LABEL: 0x83BD
STRING: ――Abandon the infected.

LABEL: 0x83E1
STRING: That was her absolute rule.

LABEL: 0x8415
STRING: She wouldn't make herself an exception to that rule――

LABEL: 0x8447
STRING: She was the only one who wouldn't.

LABEL: 0x8498
STRING: 「That's why, for her, it's already――」

LABEL: 0x84C5
STRING: Already too late.

LABEL: 0x84ED
STRING: If that was what he was saying...

LABEL: 0x8517
STRING: He, who cared about her more than anyone else, then――

LABEL: 0x854F
STRING: However, that only concerned Yukari.

LABEL: 0x8577
STRING: 「I understand her condition.」

LABEL: 0x85A1
STRING: 「But why should you stay behind?」

LABEL: 0x85F1
STRING: 「Why should you die and I, who's killed dozens of people, live?」

LABEL: 0x863F
STRING: 「If you're willing to end your life out of some petty sense of guilt――」

LABEL: 0x8694
STRING: 「That's not it.」

LABEL: 0x86BE
STRING: 「Look at this...」

LABEL: 0x8701
STRING: As he spoke, Hiragino took out his left hand from his pocket.

LABEL: 0x874B
STRING: He wasn't holding anything.

LABEL: 0x876D
STRING: There was nothing in his hand, but...

LABEL: 0x885A
STRING: There.

LABEL: 0x892A
STRING: I could see...

LABEL: 0x8A4A
STRING: A strange

LABEL: 0x8A59
STRING: light――

LABEL: 0x8B70
STRING: 「Looks like... I'm done for as well.」

LABEL: 0x8B99
STRING: 「Why!?」

LABEL: 0x8BB5
STRING: 「Didn't we eradicate it all in the steam room――?!」

LABEL: 0x8BF1
STRING: How was this possible?

LABEL: 0x8C15
STRING: Impossible things kept on happening――

LABEL: 0x8C49
STRING: The despair wouldn't end.

LABEL: 0x8C6B
STRING: Black despair kept flowing in and filling the inside of the dark warehouse.

LABEL: 0x8CBD
STRING: All the hope that had been here a moment ago was revealed to be fake.

LABEL: 0x8D09
STRING: What lay at the bottom of the deep sea were only death and despair.

LABEL: 0x8DAB
STRING: 「It was my mistake.」

LABEL: 0x8DC5
STRING: 「I first noticed it in the darkness of this warehouse.」

LABEL: 0x8DF5
STRING: 「I don't think it's from Yukari. I was careful with her.」

LABEL: 0x8E39
STRING: 「Well... maybe it was when I touched that man――」

LABEL: 0x8E73
STRING: 「Hah, if this is my punishment,

LABEL: 0x8EF0
STRING: then perhaps I was wrong%Nafter all.」

LABEL: 0x8F55
STRING: How could he be so calm?

LABEL: 0x8F8D
STRING: It was like he had forgotten his anger from before and had expelled all his thoughts.

LABEL: 0x8FD9
STRING: Hiragino looked at me calmly.

LABEL: 0x9005
STRING: As if he――

LABEL: 0x9034
STRING: 「The last remnants of <COOS> remain inside me and Yukari.」

LABEL: 0x906C
STRING: 「They remain inside this ship――」

LABEL: 0x9099
STRING: It didn't stop.

LABEL: 0x90B3
STRING: Overflowing despair and death kept swirling around and around,

LABEL: 0x90DD
STRING: falling into the abyss.

LABEL: 0x912A
STRING: 「Katagiri-kun.」

LABEL: 0x9144
STRING: 「I'm asking you...」

LABEL: 0x9163
STRING: It didn't stop.

LABEL: 0x9207
STRING: 「Please...

LABEL: 0x9216
STRING: kill me.」
